review: Terrible. Horrible. Doesn't work worth a crap. Wish I could give it negative 3 stars. Wouldn't connect to WiFi. Wouldn't let me log in to register. Won't download Netflix. Won't open apps screen. "Loading..." forever. Won't play shows I have purchased through Amazon. This device does not do a single thing it is supposed to do. Amazon's technical support is nothing but a guy saying "reboot and try again". I felt more knowledgeable just by Googling stuff. This was a complete waste of money and time. I thought about having another sent to me, in case it just my item, but I am not even going to bother. Going to get a Chromecast.
author: J. Gray
